subtitle: Clinical Trials on LTO Network
callout: Triall calls on the LTO Network to host the world's next generation of eClinical data
content:
Triall is integrating its APIs with CDS realizing the world's first end-to-end eClinical platform powered by blockchain.

LTO Network will be hosting this data.
points: Ensure transparency and integrity of research data.
Ability to cater for 20,000 to 1 million data points per Clinical Trial.

subtitle: Casino using Decentralized Identifiers
callout: Revolutionizing how the gambling industry works — one casino at a time
content:
Sphereon built a solution which leverages our GDPR-friendly Verifiable Credentials and Decentralized Identifier privacy technologies. It allows casino players to transfer their winnings using verified identity credentials.

We begin with London’s prestigious Les Ambassadeurs Casino.
points: Secure winnings payout via stable-coin wallets.
Innovate steps to AML (anti-money laundering) compliance.

subtitle: UN Open Source Land Registry Solution
callout: Anchoring and verifying land registry deeds — together with the United Nations.
content:
Our blockchain-based solution to land registration management and data verification.

Systematic. Transparent. Secure.
points: Employ emerging tech to map the property registration process.
Enable property owners to demonstrate land title authenticity.

subtitle: Decentralized Identifier Wallet
callout: Together with Sphereon, we built the MyCompanyWallet app— a digital wallet for companies.
content:
Our clients have the power to securely store, and selectively share their validated credential data.

We’re taking on-boarding to the next level.
points: Significantly shorten and improve application and onboarding processes.

subtitle: Data Anchoring and Smart Verification
callout: With our brilliant friends at NEN, (Netherlands Standardization Institute) we built an instant smart certificate.
content:
Verify official certificates in real-time with uncopyable smart QR codes anchored to our blockchain.

Making on the spot verification possible.
points: Synced with NEN’s Certificate Registration System.

subtitle: Tamper Prevention on Documents
callout: Providing assurnace that your document contents have not been tampered with.
content:
When a document is signed, SignRequest stores the hashed (fingerprint) document and a timestamp on our blockchain, providing proof of when a document was signed.

Document authenticity, simplified.
points: Increased value for documents that are verifiable and independently auditable.

subtitle: Cross-Chain Priacy Aware KYC Solution
callout: Meet Proofi — our latest innovation in the digital identity space. Powered by Chainlink.
content:
First impressions are everything, but the required KYC/AML steps can complicate onboarding procedures, making it frustrating for new clients.

Proofi fixes this problem once and for all by issuing verifiable credentials that can be used everywhere.
points: Enhanced protection options using Verifiable Credentials technology.
Seamless permission granting, all done cross-chain.
